author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: Server-side rendering is all the rage right now. But if you aren't using a Node.js server then you're out of luck. In this article I'm going to explain a method I use to fake server-side rendering using Vue.js and Laravel.
name: Faking Server-Side Rendering With Vue.js and Laravel
